input.sentences: i went to check out the town .
there were many small buildings around .
there were n't very many people out .
all of the buildings were very old .
output.sentences: The giant chair was a popular tourist attraction in the small town.
There was also a two-story library.
In the center of town is a small building that is painted white.
It's across the street from a humble storefronts.
On the edge of town is where the trouble-makers live.
